author: Marco Mirabella
title: Ensuro: A Decentralized Insurance
description: Insurance is hardly present where most needed, as in developing countries, and is unavailable as an investment product for ordinary people.
solution: Create a decentralized liquidity pool that acts as an insurance fund to back up parametric insurance products.
experience: C-suite comes from Venture Capital, Blockchain (Layer2), 25yr+ Software Development, PhD Mathematics, Ms Physics, Financial Risk Management.
